sense.def:
To listen to someone
pomeni nameniti pozornost osebi, ki govori, ali zvoku.

seg.quote: Listen carefully to what he says.
They listen to some music or read until I put them to bed.

sense.def:
To listen for a sound
pomeni biti budni, pripravljeni, da slišimo zvok, če bi se pojavil.

seg.quote: She sat quite still, listening for her baby's cry.

sense.def:
To listen to someone
pomeni tudi verjeti nekomu ali sprejeti njegov nasvet.

seg.quote: No one here will listen to you, not without proof.
He refused to listen to reason.

sense.def:
To listen in to a private conversation
pomeni na skrivaj poslušati zaseben pogovor.
